name: Elfaun: Shadows Fall
description:
Elfaun: Shadows Fall invites you to a world of fear and wonder, nightmares and dreams. Explore a realm of fantasy with mysteries unfolding, and return from death to triumph over fearsome evil foes. Discover mystical landscapes, perform esoteric rituals, craft epic weapons and armor, summon spooky companions, and punch demons in the face!


  • Retro-esque graphical style
  • Vitality system and Evil enemies
  • Dreamlike atmosphere
  • Distinct and vibrant zones to explore
  • Secrets to discover
  • Crafting and rituals
  • Inventory Management
  • Quests
  • Action-strategy combat
  • Find your own path to power
  • Pets

Elfaun: Shadows Fall offers a fresh take on the Dark Fantasy genre and an action-roleplaying challenge like no other. We guarantee a truly special experience you won't soon forget!

Explore the mystical Spiderwoods...


March through the haunted Gravewoods...

... and conquer the sprawling Afterworld,

where the deadliest foes await.


We are Thistlewind Games, a passionate two-person team dedicated to crafting immersive fantasy experiences and worlds. Our promise to you is that we will always continue to patch and update all of our games, and always search for new ways to pique your curiosity, reward your exploration, and respect your intelligence as a player. 

We hope you enjoy your stay in Elfaun! To let us know what you think, suggest features/content, or to inquire about working with us, shoot us an email...

 here: twgfeedback@gmail.com

or join our Discord server to converse with us directly: https://discord.gg/NG3Cuzw9jm

... and we will be sure to respond promptly! Your feedback is vital to our success and continued improvement.
